author: https://www.facebook.com/bbcnews
title: Coronavirus: Fake and misleading stories that went viral this week
description: A global look at Covid-19 rumours and disinformation.
content:
We've all been there. A coronavirus post that could be true and sounds about right, but how do we know it's accurate?
To help, the BBC's disinformation-monitoring team is fact-checking and verifying some of the most widely shared fake and misleading stories … [+5399 chars]
